snippet.title: Border Bots VR - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet some quirky robot characters and see gameplay from Border Bots VR in this trailer for the VR simulation puzzle game. Border Bots VR is available now on PlayStation VR2, SteamVR, and Meta Quest 2.

Transporting players to a robot-led future and placing them into the boots of a human border agent stationed within a futuristic megacity, Border Bots VR will task players with managing the flow of robots into the city after an incident sees them mysteriously malfunctioning.
